scripts.build_start: npm run build && npm run start
scripts.docker:build: npm run build && docker container stop vps-frontend || true && docker container rm vps-frontend || true && docker image rm vps-frontend-image || true && docker build -t vps-frontend-image .
scripts.docker:run: docker container stop vps-frontend || true && docker container rm vps-frontend || true && docker run --name vps-frontend -p 8080:3000 -d --network vps vps-frontend-image
scripts.docker:build_run: npm run docker:build && npm run docker:run
